channel.title: churches on Churches
channel.description: Recent content in churches on Churches

item.title: St. Marys - San Antonio, Texas
Basilica of St. Stephen - New Orleans, Louisiana
St. John's Episcopal Church - Savannah, Georgia
item.description: The only non-Catholic church we visited. Reminded us of the Ordinariate parish my parents attend.

item.title: St. John the Evangelist - Cincinnati, Kentucky
item.description: Sadly, St. John’s was closed and the office would only open it for mass on the weekend.

item.title: St. William - Cincinnati, Ohio
item.description: Sadly, it was locked and we couldn’t go in.

item.title: St. Francis Xavier - Cincinnati, Ohio
item.description: Sadly, it was under construction and we couldn’t go in.

item.title: Mission Conception - San Antonio, Texas
Mission San Jose - San Antonio, Texas
Cathedral of Our Lady of Walsingham - Houston, Texas
item.description: Fun fact, the closest Catholic Church to Jade’s childhood home in Rochester is an ordinate parish with Our Lady of Walsingham as it’s Cathedral.

item.title: Cathedral of San Fernando - San Antonio, Texas
Cathedral of St. Louis - New Orleans, Louisiana
St. Patrick - New Orleans, Louisiana
Basilica of The Immaculate Conception - Jacksonville, Florida
Cathedral Basilica of St. John the Baptist - St. Augustine, Florida
item.description: We didn’t grab many pictures because we’ve been here before. But a truly stunning church that will always hold a special place in our hearts.

item.title: National Shrine of Our Lady of La Leche - St. Augustine, Florida
item.description: The site of the first mass. What more do I need to say?

item.title: St. Augustine - Cincinnati, Kentucky
St. Lawrence - Cincinnati, Ohio
St. Monica and St. George Newman Center - Cincinnati, Ohio
item.description: The best school church we’ve ever seen.

item.title: St. Mary's Assumption - New Orleans, Louisiana
item.description: Has the National Shrine of Blessed Francis Xavier Seelos attached. Quite a find and a beautiful place to pray!

item.title: Mother of God - Cincinnati, Kentucky
Cathedral Basilica of St. Anthony - Beaumont, Texas
Cathedral Basilica of St. John the Baptist - Savannah, Georgia
item.description: The most beautiful church we visited on the trip. The painting and design truly move the soul.

item.title: Cathedral Basilica of the Assumption - Cincinnati, Kentucky
item.description: The relic collection behind the altar was stunning. Every saint you could imagine, plus the true cross and much more!

item.title: Cathedral Basilica of St. Peter in Chains - Cincinnati, Ohio
item.description: The entire church felt like a rock. Unreal. Likely our favorite church of the trip! And certainly the best stations of the cross.

item.title: Old St. Mary's - Cincinnati, Ohio
